Get specific codelist from national codes
Check specific codelist value in national codes

referenceNumber.description: Optional reference number (i.e. MRN, GDRN or JRN). Exact match search criterion.

dateCreatedFrom.description: Optional search criterion. Compared against > dateCreatedFrom.

dateCreatedTo.description: Optional search criterion. Compared against < dateCreatedTo.

sender.description: Optional SenderCountry. Exact match search criterion.

recipient.description: Optional RecipientCountry. Exact match search criterion.

messageType.description: Optional type. Exact match search criterion.

state.description: Optional state. Exact match search criterion.

messageIdentification.description: Optional messageIdentification. Exact match search criterion.

correlationIdentifier.description: Optional correlationIdentifier. Exact match search criterion.

MessageSearchDto.description: Message search criteria model. Default sorting by creationDateTime DESC is forced.
